title: Black Dotted Lines Appearing at Random after new patch
body: I have black dotted lines appearing very small but noticeable after the new patch any ideas on how to fix this?

replies.body:
Hey guys, I reached out to our tech team about this and it may be a config issue.  Resetting config may help fix this up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
